config_markup.error_conversionpage: You must select a conversion page before you can save the A/B test.
config_markup.error_selected_notpublished: You cannot select an unpublished page as your conversion goal page.
config_markup.error_selected_samepage: You cannot select the page you are testing as the conversion goal page.

config_markup.conversion_label: Number of minutes until another page is visited
config_markup.error_invalid_timeoutvalue: Number of minutes must be a value between 1 and 60

stickysite_kpi.description: Converts when a user visits the content under test and then visits any other page within the same browser session.
stickysite_kpi.name: Site Stickiness

readonly_markup.conversion_selector_description: Visitor navigates to any other page within {0} minute(s).
